cli_comprehensive_analysis.metadata: Complete CLI response aggregation from multi-source collection
cli_comprehensive_analysis.company_overview: HP Inc. provides personal computing and other access devices, imaging and printing products, and related technologies, solutions, and services globally. The company operates through Personal Systems and Printing segments.

business_segments.personal_systems: Commercial and consumer PCs, workstations, thin clients, mobility devices
business_segments.printing: Consumer and commercial printers, supplies, solutions

business_model.operational_model: Design, manufacture, and sale of computing and printing products globally

business_specific_kpis: PC market share: 26.7% in US market
